mapper.select: select rownum no, i.* from member m join employees e on m.email = e.email join ing_table i on e.employee_id = i.employee_id where e.email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.document_submit = 'y'
mapper.insert: insert into ing_table (employee_id, department_id, company_cd, document_title, document_content, document_submit) values (#{employee_id}, #{department_id}, #{company_cd}, #{document_title}, #{document_content}, #{document_submit})
